comments:
The RenderedImageFactory is logging an exception every time it tries to identify image data that is non-SVG.  For example, if I try to render a gif image, the isSVG() method will take the try to create an SVG document from the gif byte data.  A non-brute-force way to identify the image data should be investigated.

Stack trace:
